title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 240-2.1 - General requirements
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 240-2.1 - General requirements

State Regulations

The affected MPOs and NYSDOT shall provide involved
agencies with reasonable opportunity for consultation throughout the process of
determining conformity of MPO long range transportation plans and TIPs. The
department shall provide reasonable opportunity for consultation with involved
agencies throughout the process of developing applicable SIP revisions. Such
reasonable opportunity shall include substantial compliance with all applicable
consultation procedures set forth in this Subpart. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
§§
240-2.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
